metadata.name: Ode to Present
metadata.description:
One is the Past, the other is the Future. In between is Present, in a myriad of flowing colourful patterns. 

I imagine the two characters as an ode brought to living in the present moment, where everything that's built in one's heart merge and unify, captivating all the essence of the beauty and goodness.

Technique: Photo Manipulation, Digital Painting, Digital Collage
4000 x 5000 pixels
300 dpi
